scripts.all: npm run pre ; npm run main ; npn run extra1 ; npm run extra3
scripts.pre: node jobs/test.js | tee tmp/test.txt ; gnuplot gnuplot/test.txt
scripts.main: npm run main_impulse ; npm run main_step
scripts.main_impulse: node jobs/main_impulse.js | tee tmp/main_impulse.txt ; gnuplot gnuplot/main_impulse.txt
scripts.main_step: node jobs/main_step.js | tee tmp/main_step.txt ; gnuplot gnuplot/main_step.txt
scripts.extra1: npm run extra1_impulse ; npm run extra1_step
scripts.extra1_impulse: node jobs/extra1_impulse.js | tee tmp/extra1_impulse.txt ; gnuplot gnuplot/extra1_impulse.txt
scripts.extra1_step: node jobs/extra1_step.js | tee tmp/extra1_step.txt ; gnuplot gnuplot/extra1_step.txt
scripts.extra3: node jobs/extra3.js | tee tmp/extra3.txt ; gnuplot gnuplot/extra3.txt
